item.description:
Hello Conscious Creators!

Relationships and LOA will be our discussion topic this month.

Join us to become more aware of your beliefs and live more consciously! We meet to share philosophies, ideas and connect with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson to create the changes we desire.

We meet from 9:30am-11:00am in the back room. If the room is not available (they don't let me reserve on Saturday's), look for our meetup sign on a table. Call me if you can't find us!

The Saugus Panera is in a small plaza of shops next to Marshalls across from Target on the South side of Route 1.

See you there!

Julie
Organizer
617-678-5061
item.how_to_find_us: Back room or look for meetup sign on table. Call my cell phone if you can't locate us!

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Relationships & LOA
